amendment.description: Amendment allocates an additional $100 million for Army Corps of Engineers construction projects related to flood control.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the amount made available for "Corps of Engineers-Civil--Construction", and increasing the amount made available for the same account, by $100,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A059) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A059) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
